name: The Last Spaceship (Thong Nguyen)
description:
This is a short demo I developed which takes a different approach to space-shooter. In this game, player only has limited supply of ammo and health point, so the game becomes much more challenging.

Let me know what you think about this game. If you think it is fun to play, I will try to spend more time and develop it into a complete game with more features and more in-depth gameplay mechanics.

This game requires Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to work properly, which you can download at:

https://www.java.com/en/download/
